      • toSdpOms

        public java.lang.String toSdpOms(java.lang.String sdpOfferReceived)
        Parameters:
        sdpOfferReceived - is the sdp received from OMS. Its contains unexpected characters "\\"
        Returns:
        OMS's sdp is return without unexpected character
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • toSdpBrowser

        public java.lang.String toSdpBrowser(java.lang.String sdpOms,
                            java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        sdpOms - is OMS sdp
        type - is either "offer" or "answer"
        Returns:
        OMS's sdp is adapted to a form that a Browser can recognize
